languages.text:
If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the target of the Executioner's next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area{/g} attack). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target. This ability is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}forced repentance{/g}.

If a target of the Executioner's next successful weapon attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area{/g} attack). This damage is dealt after all other effects of the weapon attack are applied. After that, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target. This ability is applied instead of Scourging Strikes and removes all stacks of Forced Repentance.

If a target of the Executioner's next successful weapon attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area{/g} attack). This damage is dealt after all other effects of the weapon attack are applied. After that, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target. This ability is applied instead of Scourging Strikes and removes all stacks of Forced Repentance.

If the target of the Executioner's next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area{/g} attack). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target. This ability is applied instead of Scourging Strikes and removes all stacks of forced repentance.

If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.

languages.text:
Si el objetivo del próximo impacto del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} sufre cualquier efecto de daño continuado, recibe inmediatamente 3 aplicaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de cada uno de esos efectos (2 aplicaciones si el ejecutor utiliza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}). Este daño se inflige después de aplicar todos los demás efectos del ataque. Después, se eliminan todos los efectos de daño continuado del objetivo.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se aplica en lugar de {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Golpes flagelantes{/g} y elimina todas las cargas de {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g}.
languages.original_text:
If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Si el objetivo del próximo impacto del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} sufre cualquier efecto de daño continuado, recibe inmediatamente 3 aplicaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de cada uno de esos efectos (2 aplicaciones si el ejecutor utiliza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}). Este daño se inflige después de aplicar todos los demás efectos del ataque. Después, se eliminan todos los efectos de daño continuado del objetivo.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se aplica en lugar de {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Golpes flagelantes{/g} y elimina todas las cargas de {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の次に成功した攻撃のターゲットが何らかの継続ダメージ効果を受けている場合、このターゲットは即座に、その効果それぞれから{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を3回分受ける（エクスキューショナーが{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}をした場合は2回分）。このダメージは攻撃によるすべての他の効果が適用された後に与えられる。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}痛打{/g}の代わりに適用され、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。
languages.original_text:
If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の次に成功した攻撃のターゲットが何らかの継続ダメージ効果を受けている場合、このターゲットは即座に、その効果それぞれから{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を3回分受ける（エクスキューショナーが{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}をした場合は2回分）。このダメージは攻撃によるすべての他の効果が適用された後に与えられる。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}痛打{/g}の代わりに適用され、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。

languages.text:
如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}下次攻击命中了受到持续伤害效果影响的目标，则该目标立刻受到3次持续伤害效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}（如果行刑者使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，则目标会受到2次伤害）。此伤害会在所有其他攻击效果生效之后进行结算，结算后，从目标身上移除所有持续伤害效果。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}不会触发{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}灾祸打击{/g}的效果，同时移除所有{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}效果层数。
languages.original_text:
If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}下次攻击命中了受到持续伤害效果影响的目标，则该目标立刻受到3次持续伤害效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}（如果行刑者使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，则目标会受到2次伤害）。此伤害会在所有其他攻击效果生效之后进行结算，结算后，从目标身上移除所有持续伤害效果。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}不会触发{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}灾祸打击{/g}的效果，同时移除所有{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}效果层数。

languages.text:
Ist das Ziel des nächsten erfolgreichen Angriffs des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten belegt, erleidet dieses Ziel sofort 3 Instanzen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch jeden dieser Effekte (2 Instanzen, wenn der Henker einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Bündel{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausführt). Dieser Schaden wird verursacht, nachdem alle anderen Effekte des Angriffs angewandt wurden. Anschließend werden alle Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte vom Ziel entfernt.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird anstelle von {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Peitschende Hiebe{/g} angewandt und entfernt alle Stapel von {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g}.
languages.original_text:
If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Ist das Ziel des nächsten erfolgreichen Angriffs des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten belegt, erleidet dieses Ziel sofort 3 Instanzen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch jeden dieser Effekte (2 Instanzen, wenn der Henker einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Bündel{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausführt). Dieser Schaden wird verursacht, nachdem alle anderen Effekte des Angriffs angewandt wurden. Anschließend werden alle Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte vom Ziel entfernt.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird anstelle von {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Peitschende Hiebe{/g} angewandt und entfernt alle Stapel von {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g}.

languages.text:
Si la cible de la prochaine attaque réussie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} est sous un effet de dégâts progressifs, elle subit immédiatement 3 instances de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de chacun de ces effets (2 instances si l'exécuteur effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}attaque en rafale{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}). Ces dégâts sont infligés une fois tous les autres effets de l'attaque appliqués. Les effets de dégâts progressifs sont ensuite dissipés.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique à la place de {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Flagellation{/g} et dissipe tout cumul de {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g}.

If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.

Si la cible de la prochaine attaque réussie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} est sous un effet de dégâts progressifs, elle subit immédiatement 3 instances de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de chacun de ces effets (2 instances si l'exécuteur effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}attaque en rafale{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}). Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique à la place de {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Flagellation{/g} et dissipe tout cumul de {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g}.

languages.text:
Если на цель следующей успешной атаки {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} действуют эффекты периодического урона, то сразу же после получения попадания эта цель трижды получает внеочередной {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от этих эффектов (дважды, если палач совершает атаку {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g}). Цель получает урон после применения всех остальных эффектов атаки. Затем с нее снимаются все эффекты периодического урона.
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} применяется вместо {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Секущих ударов{/g} и заменяет все уровни {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительного покаяния{/g}.
languages.original_text:
If the target of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next successful attack is under any damage-over-time effects, this target will immediately suffer 3 instances of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from each of these effects (2 instances if the Executioner makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}). Если на цель следующей успешной атаки {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} действуют эффекты периодического урона, то сразу же после получения попадания эта цель трижды получает внеочередной {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от этих эффектов (дважды, если палач совершает атаку {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g}). Цель получает урон после применения всех остальных эффектов атаки. Затем с нее снимаются все эффекты периодического урона.
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} применяется вместо {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Секущих ударов{/g} и заменяет все уровни {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительного покаяния{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat'ın{/g} bir sonraki başarılı saldırısının hedefi, zamanla hasar veren herhangi bir etkiden muzdaripse bu etkilerin her birinden anında 3 kez daha {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} silsilesine (Cellat, {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} yaparsa 2 kez daha) maruz kalır. Bu hasar, saldırının diğer tüm etkileri uygulandıktan sonra verilir. Ardından hedefteki tüm zamanla hasar veren etkiler ortadan kalkar.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Kırbaç Gibi Darbeler{/g} yerine uygulanır ve tüm {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Zoraki Tövbe{/g} birikimlerini kaldırır.
languages.original_text:

This damage is dealt after all other effects from the attack are applied. Then, all damage-over-time effects are removed from the target.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is applied instead of {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g} and removes all stacks of {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g}.
